    <facet>

      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>

            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/111009</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Nariši, napiši</string>
            <string language="en">Write and draw</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schreiben Sie und zeichnen Sie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Écrivez et dessinez</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escreva e desenhe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scriva e dissipi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γράψτε και σύρετε</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Escriba y trace</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učenec najprej nariše risbo in na podlagi svoje risbice napiše zgodbico.</string>
            <string language="en">Collection of templates that can be used with students to draw a picture and write a story about it.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">slika</string>
            <string language="en">image</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">zgodba</string>
            <string language="en">story</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">opis</string>
            <string language="en">description</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ansammlung Schablonen, die mit Kursteilnehmern 
benutzt werden können, um eine Abbildung zu zeichnen und eine 
Geschichte über sie zu schreiben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Collection de descripteurs qui peuvent être 
employés avec des étudiants pour dessiner une image et pour écrire 
une histoire à son sujet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Coleção dos moldes que podem ser usados com 
estudantes desenhar um retrato e escrever uma história sobre ela.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Accumulazione delle mascherine che possono essere
usate con gli allievi per dissipare un'immagine e per scrivergli una 
storia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συλλογή των προτύπων που μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί με 
τους σπουδαστές για να σύρει μια εικόνα και να γράψει μια ιστορία
για την.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Colección de los modelos que se pueden utilizar 
con los estudiantes para trazar un cuadro y para escribir una historia
sobre ella.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bild</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beschreibung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">image</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">histoire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">description</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">imagem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">história</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">descrição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">immagine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">storia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">descrizione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εικόνα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ιστορία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιγραφή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">imagen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">historia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">descripción</string>
          </keyword>
